apps.localizedDescription:
PLAY AS MICKEY IN THIS MAGICAL DISNEY ADVENTURE! ALL-NEW HD GRAPHICS AND GAMEPLAY!

This app is optimized for iPhone 4S/iPad3 and above.

Mickey Mouse returns to star in Castle of Illusion, a fantastical reimagining of the Sega Genesis classic. When the evil witch Mizrabel kidnaps Minnie, itâ€™s up to Mickey to brave the dangers of the Castle of Illusions to rescue Minnie. Gather your courage and traverse enchanted forests, take on hordes of rebellious toys and navigate mazes of living books. Play as Mickey and save Minnie from Mizrabelâ€™s evil clutches!

GAME FEATURES â€“

-Play as Mickey Mouse in this reimagining of the classic Sega Genesis/Mega Drive game!

-Experience a world of wonder, brought to life with all-new graphics and magical adventures!

-Journey across five magical worlds filled with Mizrabelâ€™s powerful minions!

-Complete hidden challenges to customize Mickey with classic costumes!
apps.name: Castle of Illusion
apps.subtitle: Starring Mickey Mouse

apps.localizedDescription:
Rayman has been shrunk to the size of an ant! To undo this spell, insects, mushrooms, leaves, and other plants will be your allies as you find your way through a wonderful, macro-photographic world.

From a gorgeous river to a spider nest or the deep recesses of a tree, Rayman Mini thrusts players into a rich, natural environment through exciting 48 levels.

Rayman Mini is a runner platforming game for the whole family! It offers a fun, fast-paced experience that lets players set their own pace. Go for a simple run or try the challenge of getting the perfect score!

To get through this super-sized world, itâ€™s all about getting the right rhythm in the quest for the perfect flow. Use your honed reflexes, memorize the maps and replay the level as many times as you wantâ€¦ who knows, you might just find some hidden secrets!

Choose between 3 characters and unlock tons of different costumes to customize your experience.

This is just the beginning of your Rayman Mini journeyâ€¦ Stay tuned for more miniaturized fun!
apps.name: Rayman Mini
apps.subtitle: New epic journey for your hero
apps.versionDescription: Various bug fixes and performance improvements

apps.localizedDescription:
In Bridge Constructor+ you have to prove yourself as an accomplished master bridge builder. Play 40 different levels, and build bridges over deep valleys, canals, and rivers. Stress tests reveal whether the bridge you build can withstand the daily stress of continual use from cars, trucks and, more recently, super-heavy tank trucks.





You can choose from a range of materials for each individual bridge, such as wood, steel, cables, or concrete pillars. Use the appropriate materials and stay within budget to build the perfect bridge. The choice of different materials means that there are numerous solutions and approaches and you can build each bridge in any number of ways â€“ your budget is the only limit. The refined grid system allows you to realise your idea of the perfect bridge with even more precision. Let your imagination and creativity run free! And if you happen to run into a dead end, you can pick up valuable tips from the help system!



Including awesome Add-Ons: SlopeMania & Trains

In the SlopeMania add-on you find yourself on the Tiltin Islands, home to three brand new islands where you'll even be building your bridges inside colorful grottoes! The 24 tricky, never-before-seen levels will have you using sloping lanes to overcome the massive height differences. The "Crazy Levels" are the real brainteasers and require out-of-the-box thinking and unusual solutions.



Visit the Choonited Kingdom island group in the Trains add-on, with a total of 18 new levels across three islands. Build massive bridges that can withstand the enormous weight of the two new vehicles on offer â€“ a commuter train and a heavily loaded freight train. The idyllic and beautifully designed landscapes will make the heart of every railroad fanatic skip a beat.




FEATURES:

â€¢ 40 Levels on the island nation of Camatuga

â€¢ Free build mode and help system

â€¢ 5 Settings: city, canyon, beach, mountains, hills

â€¢ Improved grid system

â€¢ Map with unlocked worlds/levels

â€¢ 4 different building materials: wood, steel, cables, concrete pillars

â€¢ Color coded load indicator for different building materials

â€¢ Three different load bearing levels: car, truck and tank truck

â€¢ High score per level






FEATURES SlopeMania Add-On

â€¢ Completely new Tiltin Islands

â€¢ Option to build sloping roads â€“ even for Camatuga

â€¢ Additional "Grotto" setting

â€¢ 24 "sloping" levels inc. especially tricky "Crazy Levels"

â€¢ Explosive tank truck as an exciting new vehicle




FEATURES Trains Add-On

â€¢ Open up 3 new islands with 18 new levels.

â€¢ Build bridges for modern commuter trains and heavy freight trains!

â€¢ New scenery: Enjoy the view of picturesque mountains and ravines!
apps.name: Bridge Constructor+
apps.subtitle: The #1 bridge buidling game

apps.localizedDescription:
Null's Brawl is a modified version of the popular game Brawl Stars, tailored specifically for iOS devices. This private server offers an enhanced gaming experience with unlimited resources, unlocked brawlers, and exclusive features not available in the official game.

Unlimited Resources: Enjoy infinite gems and coins to upgrade your brawlers and unlock new content.

All Brawlers Unlocked: Access every brawler from the start, including the latest additions like Epic Shade and Mythic Juju.

Exclusive Skins: Try out all skins in Nullâ€™s Brawl with Shade and Juju, featuring the exclusive Angels & Demons collection and other unique collaborations.

Real-Time PvP: Battle against other players in various game modes, just like in the official version.

Regular Updates: Experience new content and features alongside official game updates.

iOS Compatibility: Designed to work smoothly on iPhones and iPads without jailbreaking.

Ad-Free Gameplay: Enjoy uninterrupted gaming sessions without any advertisements.

Custom Maps and Skins: Create and share your own maps and skins with the community.
apps.name: Null's Brawl
apps.subtitle: Null's Brawl is a Brawl Stars private server with unlimited gems, gold and boxes. Play with friends on any brawler you want.
apps.versionDescription:
First Ultra Legendary brawler: Nullâ€™s Brawl Kaze, with two different play styles in one brawler.

New Mythic brawler: Nullâ€™s Brawl Jae-yong, who can switch between Work Mode and Party Mode.

Brawl Arena: A brand-new 3v3 game mode, just like a MOBA game.
    
Battle for Katana Kingdom: A four-part event with special rewards to win.

60 Wasabi Powers for all brawlers, with four different strength levels.

8 New Hypercharges to make your gameplay even stronger.

Gadget cooldown timers are now visible during battles.

Lots of new game modes: Samurai Smash, Mega Buffet, Oni Hunt, and Daily Contests.

10 New skins, including Fruity Kaze and Jamminâ€™ Jae.

Performance upgrades and bug fixes to make the game smoother.

apps.localizedDescription:
Null's Royale is a private server for Clash Royale, a popular mobile game developed by Supercell. It offers various features and advantages for players compared to the official game servers.

Function:

Private Server: Null's Royale operates on separate servers independent of the official Clash Royale servers.

Modified Gameplay: It provides modified features, including unlimited gems, gold, cards, and chests.

Custom Events: Null's Royale introduces unique and customized events not available in the official game.
Characteristics:

Unlimited Resources: Players can access unlimited gems, gold, and cards, enabling them to level up and progress faster.

Custom Cards: Null's Royale features exclusive cards that are not available in the original game, allowing for a diverse and customized gameplay experience.

Real-time Battles: Users can engage in real-time battles with other players on the private server.

Stable and Secure: The server is designed to provide a stable and secure gaming environment without any significant connectivity issues or security risks.
Highlights:

Exclusive Content: The private server gives players access to exclusive cards and features not found in the official game, making gameplay more exciting and unpredictable.

Faster Progression: With unlimited resources, players can upgrade cards and unlock new content at a much faster pace, allowing them to reach higher levels more quickly.

Customized Gameplay: Null's Royale offers modified events and gameplay mechanics, providing a fresh and unique experience compared to the original Clash Royale.
Advantages:

Enhanced Gameplay: The ability to access unlimited resources and unique content adds a new dimension to the game, making it more enjoyable and compelling.

Quicker Progress: Null's Royale enables players to progress faster, eliminating the need to spend significant time or money on in-app purchases.

Experimentation and Testing: The private server allows players to try out different strategies, card combinations, and game features without any limitations or risks.
apps.name: Null's Royale
apps.subtitle: Nullâ€™s Royale is an unofficial game server with unlimited gems and gold.
